statements: UPDATE media_sources SET credibility_rating = 5 WHERE media_id = 1;
UPDATE media_sources SET media_type = 'Social Media', media_name = 'Twitter' WHERE credibility_rating < 3;
UPDATE media_sources SET credibility_rating = 8, media_type = 'News' WHERE media_name = 'CNN'
UPDATE media_sources SET media_name = 'BBC News', credibility_rating = 7 WHERE media_id = 2
UPDATE media_sources SET credibility_rating = 4 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE media_sources SET name = 'New Source Name', url = 'https://newurl.com' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE media_sources SET credibility_rating = 5, url = 'https://www.example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE media_sources SET name = 'Updated Source', credibility_rating = 8 WHERE url = 'https://www.anotherexample.com';
UPDATE MediaSources SET source_name = 'Example Source' WHERE source_id = 1;
UPDATE CredibilityRatings SET rating_name = 'High' WHERE rating_id = 2;
UPDATE MediaSources SET source_name = 'New Source Name', source_url = 'https://www.newsource.com' WHERE source_id = 1;
UPDATE MediaMetadata SET rating_id = 2, source_id = 3 WHERE metadata_id = 5;
UPDATE media_sources SET source_name = 'New Source Name' WHERE source_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE credibility_ratings SET rating = 4.5 WHERE source_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE media_sources SET source_name = 'Updated Source 1', source_country = 'USA' WHERE source_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4f00';
UPDATE media_metadata SET metadata_description = 'New description', source_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4f01' WHERE metadata_id = 'd3f5e305-4000-4f7a-8d7c-4637c3106cce';
UPDATE media_sources SET source_name = 'New Source Name' WHERE source_id = 1;
UPDATE credibility_ratings SET rating_description = 'Updated rating description' WHERE rating_id = 2;
UPDATE media_sources SET source_name = 'New Source Name', source_url = 'http://newsource.com' WHERE source_id = 1;
UPDATE source_ratings SET rating_value = 4.5 WHERE source_id = 2 AND rating_id = 3;
